snippet.title: Desynced - Official Gameplay Overview Trailer
snippet.description:
Join a member of the development team at Stage Games for a deep dive into Desynced, including gameplay, your objectives, how to use resources, a look at components you will use and unlock, buildings, writing behaviors of units and buildings to give you more control, a peek at combat, and more from this upcoming sci-fi strategy game.

In Desynced, gather, build, research, and explore the unknown. Alone or with friends, unveil the mystery of an AI on the edge of self-awareness and uncover the hidden truth in this blend of strategy, automation, and exploration.

Desynced is available now in Steam Early Access.
